metadata.title: CVE-2012-5621 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
lib/engine/components/opal/opal-call.cpp in ekiga before 4.0.0 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via an OPALconnection with a party name that contains invalid UTF-8 strings.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5621` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ekiga - 4.0.1-6
ekiga-plugin-evolution - 4.0.1-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ekiga package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.1-6').
